entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:35 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
